name: final-project-cs-491
description: The quiz app will be a web game which would allow 2 players (or more) to connect to a quiz and play against each other. A game consists of multiple rounds, in each round a random movie/song will be displayed and players have to guess the year in which it was released. The questions would be of the following types: A song/ movie poster would be displayed and the player has to guess the year in which it was release. A part of the song/movie would be played and the user has to guess its name Each correct answer will be rewarded positive point and wrong answer will lead to negative point or zero point. The player with the most points at the end wins!
